content: Make or buy, that is the question. No parallel with tizenOS? PalmOS? Even chromeOS? And last but not least, even the software behemoth Microsoft didn’t succeed in the embedded OS (look at windows mobile market share). Operating Systems are a special type of engineering; once could compare it with aeronautics industry: neither Airbus nor Boeing manufacture the engine installed in their plane, even if it is a huge part of the selling price.
